task.description: Add friction, jitter, and oscillating gravity to a particle simulation iPhone application, in Objective-C.
Use the Java ASM framework to generate a Proxy class, creating a callback that is invoked for overridden methods.
Add support for exporting group membership with the SIOC ontology to a Facebook application that exports user information and relationships.
Add support for object versioning to hS3, the Haskell API to Amazon's Simple Storage Service (S3).
Create an Android widget to silence a phone's ringer, and re-enable it after a fixed amount of time.
